name: [center]Loki[/center]
text: It is I, [color=#00FF00][i]Loki[/i][/color], the God of Mischief!

name: [center]Loki[/center]
text: I must thank you for gathering the relics for me, I couldn’t have done it without you.

name: [center]Loki[/center]
text: Soon I shall destroy the heart of Yggdrasil and the nine realms will cease to be

name: [center]Loki[/center]
text: No God nor mortal remains that can oppose my power!
